# ChangeLog

## v1.5.2
* Fix: German currency formatting, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2792

## v1.5.1
* Fix: allow string and Date object for formatDateTime method

## v1.5.0
* Typescript support for locale-formatter-ebay module, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3685

## v1.4.1
* Fix: IT currency symbol wrong position, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3764

## v1.4.0
* Expose currency symbol for `formatter.formatMoney`

## v1.3.1
Added: shortampm time format property for GB, AU, CA

## v1.3.0
Added: Currency format needs to support custom decimal places (for foreign currency exchange rate), https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2772

## v1.2.0
Added: mediumnoday option, MMM YYYY, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2805

## v1.1.3
Fixed: Incorrect date format for de-DE short date format, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2763

## v1.1.2
add shortclean for zh HK

## v1.1.1
Remove space between time and am:pm

## v1.1.0
Added support for `shortclean` date format and `shortampm`, `shortampmzone` time format, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2375

## v0.2.0
Added supoprt for world currency symbols, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2103

## v0.1.2
Fixed: fails to format money with 0 value, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-1551

## v0.1.1
Fixed: fails to account for locale specific configuration, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-1514

## v0.1.0
Fixed cache max age which was incorrectly set to 1800 mseconds instead of 2 hours, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-1512

## v0.0.9
Fix: de_DE long time format

## v0.0.8
Add medium date format to en-IE, fr-FR, fr_CA, it-IT, es_ES and fix the format normalization logic that overwrites the escaped literal charcters in the date format.

## v0.0.7
Add medium date format to en-EB, en-AU, de-DE and constuct moment with locale so name of the month is localized

## v0.0.6
* Removed unused dependencies

## v0.0.5
* Added moment-timezone to return dataTime respect to request timeZone

## v0.0.4
* Added formatNumber method
